title: Kompany wants control, not entertainment, after Klassiker draw
description: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany wanted to see more control from his team in Saturday’s 2-2 draw with Borussia Dortmund. The two rivals served up a thrilling Klassiker at Allianz Arena, where all four goals came in the second half. author: SoccerNews

title: Leganes 0-1 Barcelona: LaLiga leaders nudge further ahead in title race
description: Barcelona made it 12 LaLiga games unbeaten as they beat Leganes 1-0 to move seven points clear at the summit. The Blaugrana grabbed the decisive goal just after the break at Estadio Municipal de Butarque on Saturday.
